title: Last-Minute UCI Ban for Ineos Grenadiers’ Kask Visor
content:
Last minute UCI ban left Ineos Grenadiers scrambling ahead of today's stage to replace a TT visor that’s been in use since 2022.

Read the full article at Last-Minute UCI Ban for Ineos Grenadiers’ Kask Visor on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
